text: David Warren (3 March 1925, Groote Eylandt, Australiaâ€” 19 July 2010, Brighton, Victoria, Australia) was an Australian scientist. He became famous for inventing the black box flight recorder which could give information about the causes of aircraft crashes. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Australian scientists Category:People from the Northern Territory
